page.title: 13SEWAGE WORKS, HELMSHORE.
page.content: The sewage works might not sound interesting to you, but it is to other people. To get to it you can go through a park called Snig Hole. It is a beautiful walk,without much disturbance. After a while you come out into a field.You walk across it and you come to a stile.You cross over it and just ahead of you is the sewage works. But before you get to it you will smell the soap factory. By now you should have got your handkerchief out. When you get to it the water around it will be black. Then you can go in and pick up some leaflets even if you don't like it, it is a nice walk there and back. And if you like you can have a go on the swings and other things at the park.
